how do i reset my password: You can reset your password from the Settings page under 'Change Password'.
how do i contact support: Send us an email at support@example.com and we'll be happy to help.
where are my files stored: Your files are securely stored in our cloud database and can be accessed from any device.
how do i create a new collection: Open the Collections page and click 'New Collection' to get started.
how do i upload files: Use the Upload button on the Vault or Gallery page to select your files.
how do i export my data: Go to the Export page and choose the items you wish to download.
